definitions.definition: Minimal; that is or are just sufficient.

definitions.example: I do wonder why keeping my little breasts bare can be lewd even as none tells my brother anything for being bare-chested.
The walls of this room are bare â€” why not hang some paintings on them?

definitions.definition: Having had what usually covers (something) removed.
definitions.example: The trees were left bare after the swarm of locusts devoured all the leaves.
It's bare money to get in the club each time, man.

definitions.definition: Without anything to cover up or conceal one's thoughts or actions; open to view; exposed.
One who bares or exposes something.
